original_title: Uchuu no Kishi Tekkaman Blade OVA: Missing Link
overview: Missing Link, deals with the events between Tekkaman Blade and Tekkaman Blade II, including the second Radam war, Aki's transformation into the Red Tekkaman, the Tekkaman Rebellion of Prague, and Blade's restoration.
title: Tekkaman Blade: Missing Link
